all calls to it are a mistake.

AsureBonusesCrowdsale

all calls to it are a mistake.

devdoc.details: Crowdsale with bonus rate which will be lowered to default rate after bonus time is reached.

bonusRate().return: the number of token units a buyer gets per wei before the bonus time.

bonusTime().return: the crowdsale bonus time in unix epoch seconds.

buyTokens(address).details: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE*** This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

constructor.details: Constructor, takes initial and bonus rates of tokens received per wei contributed.

params.bonusRate: Number of token units a buyer gets per wei before bonus time
params.bonusTime: The crowdsale bonus time in unix epoch seconds
params.defaultRate: Number of token units a buyer gets per wei after the bonus time

defaultRate().return: the number of token units a buyer gets per wei after the bonus time.

getCurrentRate().details: Returns the rate of tokens per wei at the present time. Note that, rate can be changed by the owner until the crowdsale is open.
getCurrentRate().return: The number of tokens a buyer gets per wei at a given time

hasClosed().details: Checks whether the period in which the crowdsale is open has already elapsed.

isOpen().return: true if the crowdsale is open, false otherwise.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

updateRates(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Owner can update bonus rate, bonus time, and default rate before crowdsale opened.

params.newBonusRate: Number of token units a buyer gets per wei before bonus time
params.newBonusTime: The crowdsale bonus time in unix epoch seconds
params.newDefaultRate: Number of token units a buyer gets per wei after the bonus time

wallet().return: the address where funds are collected.

devdoc.title: AsureBonusesCrowdsale,

rate().notice: The base rate function is overridden to revert, since this crowdsale doesn't use it, and all calls to it are a mistake.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
